post.description:
Create a new assignment with the following validations:
    1. Verify student exists
    2. Verify assignment definition exists
    3. Create the assignment
    4. Upload assignment and process file

get.description: Retrieve all assignments with pagination.

schema.title: Response List Assignments Api V1 Assignments Get

get.summary: List All Assignments By Assignment Definition
get.description: Retrieve all assignments by assignment definition with student information.

schema.title: Response List All Assignments By Assignment Definition Api V1 Assignment Defintion  Assignment Definition Id  Assignments Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific assignment by ID.
Retrieve an assignment's sections.

schema.title: Response List Assignment Sections Api V1 Assignments  Assignment Id  Sections Get

get.description: Retrieve assignments per specific assignment definition.

schema.title: Response List Assignment Definition Assignments Api V1 Assignments Assignment Definition  Assignment Definition Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve all assignment_definitions with pagination and assignment counts.

schema.title: Response List Assignment Definitions Api V1 Assignment Definitions Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific assignment_definition by ID.
Retrieve all criteria with optional filtering by type.

schema.title: Response List Criteria Api V1 Criteria Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific criteria by ID.

post.description: Link a criteria to a learning objective.

delete.description: Unlink a criteria from a learning objective.

post.description: Create a new criteria score for a grading.

get.description: List all criteria scores for a grading.

schema.title: Response List Criteria Scores Api V1 Gradings  Grading Id  Criteria Scores Get

get.description: Get a specific criteria score.

post.description:
Create a new document with the following steps:
  1. Validate metadata and assignment definition existence
  2. Upload and process the file
  3. Create the document record with its sections
  4. Schedule background creation of section-criteria mappings

get.description: Retrieve all documents for a specific assignment definition.

schema.title: Response List Documents Api V1 Assignment Definitions  Assignment Definition Id  Documents Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific document by ID within an assignment definition.

put.description: Update a specific document within an assignment definition.

delete.description: Delete a specific document within an assignment definition.

get.description: List all gradings for an Assignment.

schema.title: Response List Gradings Api V1 Assignments  Assignment Id  Gradings Get

get.description: Get a specific grading.

put.description: Update a specific grading and Criteria scores if present.

get.description: Download grades as a formatted Word document.

post.description:
Start a background task to update a grade in Moodle.
Generates feedback document and updates grading status.

schema.title: Response Update Moodle Grade Api V1 Assignments  Assignment Id  Gradings  Grading Id  Update Moodle Post

post.description: Create a new learning_objective for an assignment definition.

get.description: Retrieve all learning_objectives per assignment definition with pagination.

schema.title: Response List Learning Objectives Api V1 Assignment Definitions  Assignment Definition Id  Learning Objectives Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific learning_objective by ID.
Retrieve parts by assignment definition.

schema.title: Response List Parts Api V1 Assignment Definitions  Assignment Definition Id  Parts Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific part by ID.

post.description: Create a new section for a specific part.

get.description: Retrieve all sections for a specific part.

schema.title: Response List Part Sections Api V1 Parts  Part Id  Sections Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific section from a part.

put.description: Update a specific section in a part.

delete.description: Delete a specific section from a part.

post.description: Link a part to a learning objective.

delete.description: Unlink a part from a learning objective.

post.description: Create a new section for a specific document.

get.description: Retrieve all sections for a specific document.

schema.title: Response List Sections Api V1 Documents  Document Id  Sections Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific section from a document.

put.description: Update a specific section in a document.

delete.description: Delete a specific section from a document.

get.description: List all section criteria mappings for a specific document.

schema.title: Response List Document Section Mappings Api V1 Documents  Document Id  Section Criteria Mappings Get

post.description: Create a new section criteria mapping.

get.description: List section criteria mappings by assignment definition  with optional filtering.

schema.title: Response List Section Criteria Mappings Api V1 Assignment Definitions  Assignment Definition Id  Section Criteria Mappings Get

get.description: Get a specific section criteria mapping by ID.

post.description:
Bulk update section criteria mappings.
Creates new mappings, updates existing ones, and removes unnecessary ones.

schema.title: Response Bulk Update Section Mappings Api V1 Assignment Definitions  Assignment Definition Id  Section Criteria Mappings Bulk Update Post

get.description: Retrieve all students with pagination.

schema.title: Response List Students Api V1 Students Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific student by ID.

post.description:
Manually trigger Moodle integration job to synchronize data

This endpoint allows administrators to run the Moodle synchronization 
process on demand outside of the regular schedule.

get.description:
Get the status of recent Moodle synchronization jobs

Returns the most recent job execution records with timestamps and details.

Parameters:
- limit: Maximum number of records to return (default: 5)
